name: Pong Race
description:
Pong Race is a twist on the classic pong game.

Players score to move closer towards the middle, the first player who reaches the middle wins. The game contains random boxes that are able to affect the players speed and size.

Two players with two controllers is the best way to play the game but one player and keyboard also works fine.

Best resolution to play in is: 1024 x 768.

Sound assets from Kenney.

Bugs known:

  • UI Resolution
  • End of game messiness
